name: Kalahari bacteria
tagline: Microbiome analysis of biological soil crusts
body:
[Niche partitioning of bacterial communities in biological crusts and soils under grasses, shrubs and trees in the Kalahari](http://dx.doi.org/10.1007/s10531-014-0684-8)

David R Elliott, Andrew D Thomas, Stephen R Hoon, Robin Sen (2014)

Biodiversity and Conservation. April 2014

### Record of analysis
The data and code in this repository were used to perform the analyses presented in the above paper, specifically the release tagged as [accepted version](https://github.com/davidelliott/kalahari_bacteria/releases/tag/accepted_version). Later versions are provided for compatibility with new software versions and presentation adjustments etc.

### Output
The main output is the file [kalahari_BSC_bacteria.html](kalahari_BSC_bacteria.html) but many other files are also generated. The most important ones are directly linked in the html file, and the others can be found by browsing the [gh-pages](https://github.com/davidelliott/kalahari_bacteria/tree/gh-pages) branch of this repository.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
